Articles.Content:
People can post progress pieces on here if they want,This is for discussion as well as fisticuffs.

Edited October 27, 2013 by Spartwo
daemon, your ships seem to be a bit... unergunned. If you want, I could refit them with frontline ZS weapons, gauranteed to smash all but the best armor.

how can i put a stock weapon on something.

because

1. im not sure how to build it

2. my ksp is broken as i can not see any parts(help?)
Can i possibly make a company?

Pushing is against the rules, too. Unless you're pushing your own ship. I don't know about that one.

Edit:

While testing new atmospheric weapons...

I modified a Zokesian missile truck, the Weaver SPG, to fire my Kingslayer missile. The Ravager Mk III, a Weaver SPG with a Kingslayer, is proven to be able to fire over 11 km. No doubt if the Kingslayer hits its target, it'll do some damage, judging by the fact that it can go several hundred m/s (Highest recorded speed: 476.7 m/s). I can prove it with screenshots if I have to. Fastest recorded impact speed: 296.9 m/s. I would not want to get hit by one.

I modified a Zokesian missile truck, the Weaver SPG, to fire my Kingslayer missile. The Ravager Mk III, a Weaver SPG with a Kingslayer, is proven to be able to fire over 11 km. No doubt if the Kingslayer hits its target, it'll do some damage, judging by the fact that it can go several hundred m/s (Highest recorded speed: 476.7 m/s). I just thought the 2.1 km/s top speed was funny. At this speed, I doubt I could hit the broad side of the SPH.

where is the tutorial?

I fixed it.

And i didnt ask 3 things

#3 answer was to a previous question. You can make any company you want. Just give it a name, a flag, and make some ships. Then announce your company in a post so we know it exists.

I see no profile pic. In order to make it a flag, you should post it via imgur so we can get the full-size version.

now how do i upload a ship into a battle?

You'll need to place the ship in position in your own game and then upload the persistence file (in your saves folder) to MediaFire.

Make a challenge first.

Ok

Corgi Co is not interested in a war. Thats why all their stuff is off site. But what is there is the crappy fuel container that cant even move around. Your mission is to launch a missile from the island runway and blow up the tanker. That will start a war, cause they don't like to waste stuff.
